definitions.text: throw out of balance or equilibrium
examples: The tax relief unbalanced the budget
The prima donna unbalances the smooth work in our department

definitions.text: derange mentally, throw out of mental balance; make insane
examples: The death of his parents unbalanced him

definitions.text: being or thrown out of equilibrium

examples: a man who had gone mad

definitions.text: debits and credits are not equal
